_notes: Used to change the backround color of the callout. Format must be 'background : <color> where <color>'' = any hex color value. Theoretically, any number of valid css properties and values could be specified here (e.g. color: #fff; font-weight: 700;

accentText._notes: Used to change the text color of the highlighted text. Format must be 'color : <color> where <color>'' = any hex color value. Theoretically, any number of valid css properties and values could be specified here (e.g. color: #fff; font-weight: 700;
